basic_info.description: My name is Jose. I'm a highly skilled software engineer specializing in web and mobile development. My technical toolbox includes ES6 JavaScript, React, Express, Node.js, HTML, CSS, and Git, along with experience in Java, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, React Native, AWS, and Firebase. I've had the pleasure of contributing to exciting projects like City Diary, a React Native app that lets users record and share audio based on their location, and Fullstack Spirits, a user-friendly React e-commerce website. During my software developer internship at Thoughtworks, I honed my skills in Pair Programming, TDD, and Clean Code while building a full-stack web app. With a Certificate in Fullstack Web Development from Fullstack Academy and an AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner, I'm committed to delivering top-notch solutions. Let's create something amazing together in the world of software engineering!

projects.title: Riddler's Guessing Game
projects.description: A number guessing game where a player has 5 attempts to guess a number from 1 to 100. Every guess submitted will unlock a clue for how close or far the guess is from the answer. There is a hint feature that provides 3 additional clues.

projects.title: Fullstack Spirits
projects.description: An E-commerce web application. Visitors can browse and buy with or without an account. Ordinary users can see their order history. Admins are elevated users with authorized actions.

projects.title: City Diary
projects.description: A mobile application that allows users to record audio, pin it to their geolocation and upload it to firebase cloud storage. Audio may be private or public, the latter is accessible to all users.
